class.name: LibSM64SurfaceArray
class.brief_description: An array of surface triangles for use with [code]libsm64[/code].
class.description: An array specifically designed to hold the internal surface triangles format used by [code]libsm64[/code]. Added triangles will automatically be converted from Godot to the internal [code]libsm64[/code] format and added to the array. The array's public interface only allows for elements to be added; the array's contents are only to be consumed internally by [code]libsm64[/code]. The elements are tightly packed, so larger arrays are still performant. See [method LibSM64.static_surfaces_load] and [method LibSM64.surface_object_create].

method.name: add_triangle
method.description: Adds a new surface triangle to the array. The vertices should be in Godot's standard clockwise order. Optionally allows you to specify the [param surface_type], [param terrain_type], and [param force] of the surface.

method.name: add_triangle_with_properties
method.description: Adds a new surface triangle to the array with the provided [param properties]. The vertices should be in Godot's standard clockwise order.

method.name: add_triangles
method.description: Adds surface triangles with [param vertices] to the array. [param vertices] size should be a multiple of [code]3[/code]. The vertices should be in Godot's standard clockwise order. Optionally allows you to specify the [param surface_type], [param terrain_type], and [param force] of the surfaces.

method.name: add_triangles_with_properties
method.description: Adds surface triangles with [param vertices] to the array with the provided [param properties]. [param vertices] size should be a multiple of [code]3[/code]. The vertices should be in Godot's standard clockwise order.

method.name: append_surfaces
method.description: Appends the surfaces from another [LibSM64SurfaceArray] to the end this one.
